content:
That's fantastic! Congratulations on reaching 500 miles on your new Cannondale Synapse! It's great to hear that you're enjoying your daily commutes and putting those miles on your new bike.

Both Thule and Saris are known for their excellent customer support, which is vital when it comes to installation, maintenance, or any issues that may arise. You can expect:

* Thule: Thule offers a comprehensive customer support system, including online resources, instructional videos, and a dedicated customer service team. They also have a 5-year warranty on most of their products.
* Saris: Saris provides a wide range of customer support options, including online FAQs, instructional videos, and a customer service team available by phone or email. They also offer a lifetime warranty on most of their products.

It's reassuring to know that both brands stand behind their products and are committed to helping you get the most out of your bike rack.

Now, back to your Cannondale Synapse! 500 miles is a great milestone, and I'm sure you're enjoying the comfort and performance of your new bike. The Synapse is a great choice for daily commutes, with its endurance-focused design and comfortable ride.

How do you find the Synapse handling on your daily commutes? Are there any features that you particularly enjoy or find especially useful?
